Detailed Description
Provides functionalities for optimization tasks.
This class is designed to handle optimization operations, allowing users to set a maximum number of evaluations and assign a specific name to the optimizer. It also has methods for retrieving the maximum evaluation number and counting runs, optionally integrating with a store object.
max_evaluations (int, optional): Maximum number of evaluations allowed for the optimizer. Default is 50000. name (str, optional): The name assigned to the optimizer. Default is an empty string.
Definition at line 277 of file optimizer.py.

Gets the count of runs from the provided store.
If no store is provided, returns 0.
Parameters
store
An object with a method get_count_runs. If None, the method returns 0.
Returns
